name: Interface DoWhileLoopTree
text:
A tree node for a 'do' statement.

 For example:
 
   do
       statement
   while ( expression );
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface DoWhileLoopTree
extends ConditionalLoopTree

methods.description: Returns the condition expression of this do-while statement.
The statement contained within this do-while statement.
